name: Simple Dark Yahoo Philippines
description: A dark grey/black theme for Yahoo Philippines, in particular, pages on the domains ph.yahoo.com and ph.news.yahoo.com. Colorization is intended as the site's 'night mode' so reading articles can be a bit easier on the eyes. Planned update to fix inconsistent styling of the overlay when clicking on an article from a news category page. Screenshots will also be updated.
additional_info:
v1.1.0 - Added styling for pages on ph.news.yahoo.com domain - December 22, 2017
v1.0.0 - Working on ph.yahoo.com - December 19, 2017
